bibl.title: The Rendel Harris Papyri of Woodbrooke College, Birmingham.
bibl.seg: Powell J. Enoch, The Rendel Harris Papyri of Woodbrooke College, Birmingham.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 1936, xii-134 pp., 1 portrait, 5 pll.

C.R. par Harold I. Bell, JEA 24 (1938) pp. 141-143. - Paul Collart, REG 50 (1937) pp. 394-395. - J.G. Milne, JHS 57 (1937) p. 96. - Philips, ET 48 (1937) pp. 518-520. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 12 (1937) Nos 23-24, pp. 270-274. - Mariano San Nicoló, KVG 29 (1938) pp. 249-260. - Karl Fr.W. Schmidt, PhilWoch 59 (1939) coll. 121-129. - Verne B. Schuman, CP 33 (1938) pp. 313-319. - Bruno Snell, Gnomon 13 (1937) pp. 577-586. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 12 (1937) pp. 234-236.
